title: THE LITTLE DUTCH FRIENDS
content: Hilda, Kassie, and Karl are little Dutch children, too. They do not live far from the blue house where Jan and Katrina live. They live over on the other side of the big, brown windmill. They come to play with Jan and Katrina. Katrina and Jan go over to play with them. Hilda, Kassie, and Karl live in a red house. It is by the canal.

book.title: Windmills and wooden shoes
book.description: 简介： In Windmills and Wooden Shoes we have a continuous story of the doings of the Dutch children, Jan and Katrina and their little friends....
